title: Build a Transaction Search Feature
description: Implement a complete search function that queries transactions with ranking and highlighting.
instructions:
Complete the search implementation to:
1. Create a search_vector column combining description and category
2. Create a GIN index for fast searching
3. Implement a search function with ranking
4. Add result highlighting

hints.text: **Hint:** The second column to include is 'category'. Use 'GIN' for the index type. The match operator is '@@'. Order by rank 'DESC' to show best matches first.

commonMistakes.mistake: Using BTREE instead of GIN for tsvector index
commonMistakes.consequence: Index won't work for full-text queries
commonMistakes.correction: Always use GIN or GiST for tsvector columns

commonMistakes.mistake: Ordering by rank ASC instead of DESC
commonMistakes.correction: Use ORDER BY rank DESC for best matches first
